idea-plugin.name: Copy with Line Numbers
idea-plugin.description:
Allows copying the selection with line numbers. Main intended use is for code samples in presentations.

Just assign a shortcut to Copy with Line Numbers action (Ctrl+Shift+A, search, Alt+Enter). I prefer to reassign Ctrl+Shift+C since I don't use Copy Paths much.

Note that the implementation is REALLY ugly, so it might suddenly break with IntelliJ updates. But at least it shouldn't break any existing functionality since it's a brand new independent action. Open a GitHub issue if it breaks and I'll try to fix it.

action.description: Copy the selection with line numbers
